Key Match Events: The Padres jumped to a 4-0 lead in the first inning
The D-backs cut the margin to 4-2 in the bottom of the first inning on Corbin Carroll's solo homer
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres secured the No. 4 spot in the National League bracket, meaning they'll host a best-of-three Wild Card Series next week in San Diego
Others: The D-backs sit just behind the Mets and Braves in a tight race for the final two NL wild cards
The Mets and Braves hold tiebreakers over the defending NL champion Diamondbacks should they finish with the same record
Luis Arraez is trying to hold off Shohei Ohtani and Marcell Ozuna for the NL batting title
